DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_ID, a.CNTRCT_TYPE, a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR, a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD, a.LST_CHG_USR, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.CREATD_USR_ID, a.CREATD_TM_STMP, a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND, a.CNTRCT_HDQTR_ST_CD FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a WHERE a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,d.NOTE_ID ,n.NOTE_NM FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL d, NMST_NOTE_MSTR n WHERE d.NOTE_ID = n.NOTE_ID AND d.NOTE_VRSN_NBR=n.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID={1} AND d.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {0} AND d.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND d.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID = {1} AND d.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCOMP' AND d.NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F'

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,a.NOTE_ID,b.NOTE_NM FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL a ,NMST_NOTE_MSTR b WHERE b.NOTE_ID = a.NOTE_ID AND b.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND a.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {0} AND a.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND a.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID = {2} AND a.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHBENEFIT' AND a.NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F' ORDER BY b.NOTE_NM

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,LOB.CD_DESC_TXT,BE.CD_DESC_TXT, BG.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'product' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,LOB.CD_DESC_TXT,BE.CD_DESC_TXT, BG.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,LOB.CD_DESC_TXT,BE.CD_DESC_TXT, BG.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD

select dbms_random.random as keyval,a.CASE_NBR,a.CASE_NAME,a.GROUP_NBR,a.GROUP_NAME, a.CASE_CANCEL_DT,a.GROUP_CANCEL_DT,a.CASE_HQ_ST, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1941 and PRMRY_CD = a.FUND_ARRANGE_CODE) FUND_ARRANGE_VAL, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1948 and PRMRY_CD = a.MBU_CODE) MBU_VAL, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1949 and PRMRY_CD = a.RERATE_CODE)RERATE_VAL from MEMBERSHIP_INFO a, cmst_cntrct_mstr B where a.CNTRCT_ID =b.cntrct_id and b.cntrct_sys_id ={0}

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,(select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 2020 and PRMRY_CD =RGLTRY_AGNCY) RGLTRY_AGNCY_DESC ,(select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 2040 and PRMRY_CD =PROJ_NM_CODE) PROJ_NM_CODE_DESC, CNTRT_TRM_DT,MULTI_PLAN_IND, PRFRMNCE_GUARTE, SALE_MARKT_DT,(select CD_DESC_TXT from item where PRMRY_CD = CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT.CMPLANC_STTS) CMPLANC_STTS_DESC FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0}

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,d.NOTE_ID ,n.NOTE_NM FROM NOTE_DOMN_ASSN d, NMST_NOTE_MSTR n WHERE d.NOTE_ID = n.NOTE_ID AND d.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = n.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND d.ENTY_SYS_ID = to_char( {0} ) AND d.ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID is NULL
SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval, d.cvrg_cd, d.prcg_cd, d.ntwk_cd FROM cntrct_prcg_info d WHERE d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} ORDER BY d.cvrg_cd, d.prcg_cd, d.ntwk_cd

SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.random AS keyval, b.admin_opt_sys_id, c.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, e.psbl_answr, a.rfrnc_id, c.prvdr_arngmnt, f.admin_opt_desc_txt FROM qstnr_mstr a, cntrct_admin_qstn_answr_ovrd b, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr c, item d, psbl_answr e, admin_opt_mstr f, dtyp_data_type g WHERE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.admin_opt_sys_id = b.admin_opt_sys_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = f.admin_opt_sys_id AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND c.dtyp_data_type_id = g.dtyp_data_type_id AND a.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd AND d.ctlg_id = 1938 AND b.ovrd_answr_id = e.psbl_answr_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} ORDER BY f.admin_opt_desc_txt

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,D.RULE_TYP_CD, B.GNRTD_RULE_ID,B.RULE_ID,C.RULE_SHRT_DESC, B.RULE_PVA,C.RULE_GRP_IND,A.RULE_OVRD_VAL FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN A,PROD_RULE_ASSN B,RULE C ,RULE_TYPE D WHERE A.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID= B.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID AND C.RULE_ID = B.RULE_ID AND C.RULE_TYP_CD = D.RULE_TYP_CD AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} ORDER BY RULE_ID

SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.random AS keyval, b.admin_opt_sys_id, f.admin_lvl_nm, d.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, e.psbl_answr, c.rfrnc_id, d.prvdr_arngmnt, g.admin_opt_desc_txt, (SELECT note_id ID FROM note_domain_ovrd_val WHERE prmry_enty_type = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND scndry_enty_type = 'ATTACHQUESTION' AND prmry_enty_id = {0} AND bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {1} AND scndry_enty_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr) note_id, (SELECT b.note_nm FROM note_domain_ovrd_val a, nmst_note_mstr b WHERE a.prmry_enty_type = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND a.scndry_enty_type = 'ATTACHQUESTION' AND a.prmry_enty_id = {0} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {1} AND a.scndry_enty_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND a.note_id = b.note_id AND a.note_vrsn_nbr = b.note_vrsn_nbr) note_name FROM cntrct_answr_ovrd a, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn b, qstnr_mstr c, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr d, psbl_answr e, badl_admn_lvl f, admin_opt_mstr g WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_admin_sys_id = {2} AND b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND f.admin_lvl_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_sys_id AND c.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND d.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND e.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND e.psbl_answr_id = a.ovrd_answr_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = g.admin_opt_sys_id ORDER BY g.admin_opt_desc_txt

select dbms_random.random as keyval,b.admin_opt_sys_id, F.admin_lvl_nm, d.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, e.psbl_answr, c.rfrnc_id ,d.prvdr_arngmnt from CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD A,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN B,QSTNR_MSTR C, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR D,PSBL_ANSWR E, badl_admn_lvl F Where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and B.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID ={2} and A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {3} and b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id =A.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id and F.admin_lvl_sys_id = B.admin_lvl_sys_id and c.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id and D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and E.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and E.psbl_answr_id = A.ovrd_answr_id

select dbms_random.random as keyval,SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM,ADMN_MTHD_DESC,SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF from ( select s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF,s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID, a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,m.ADMN_MTHD_NO from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s, ADMN_MTHD_OVRD a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m where a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = {2} and a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = m.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID union select distinct s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID,null,'', null, null from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s where s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID not in (select SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_OVRD a where a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = {2}) )order by SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM

SELECT dbms_random.random AS keyval, c.BNFT_ID_NM , c.BNFT_SYS_ID , c.bnft_desc_txt , c.BNFT_VRSN_NBR , c.bnft_ctgry , c.bnft_type , f.bnft_admin_sys_id , c.bnft_parnt_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, bnft_cmpnt_hrchy_assn b , bmst_bnft_mstr c , BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR d , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN f , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR g WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {1} AND a.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_sys_id = a.bnft_sys_id AND b.bnft_sys_id = c.bnft_sys_id AND d.bnft_sys_id = a.bnft_sys_id AND f.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND g.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND g.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT >= d.BNFT_DEFN_EFCTV_DT AND g.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT <= d.BNFT_DEFN_EXPIRY_DT GROUP BY c.BNFT_ID_NM , c.BNFT_SYS_ID , c.bnft_desc_txt , c.BNFT_VRSN_NBR , c.bnft_ctgry , c.bnft_type , f.bnft_admin_sys_id , c.bnft_parnt_sys_id

select dbms_random.random as keyval,type,code from ( SELECT itm.CD_DESC_TXT as code,cat.CTLG_DESC_TXT as type FROM ITEM itm,CATALOG cat WHERE itm.CTLG_ID in ( SELECT CTLG_ID FROM CATALOG WHERE UPPER(CTLG_DESC_TXT) IN (SELECT UPPER(SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE) FROM BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = {0})) and itm.prmry_cd in (SELECT SLCTD_ITEM_CD FROM BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = {0}) and cat.CTLG_ID = itm.CTLG_ID UNION select b.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND as code ,a.SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE as type from BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO a, DTYP_DATA_TYPE b where a.SLCTD_ITEM_CD = to_char(b.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID) and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0})

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,LOB.CD_DESC_TXT,BE.CD_DESC_TXT, BG.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'stdbenefit' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD

select dbms_random.random as keyval,a.RULE_ID,b.BNFT_MNING_OVRD,c.RULE_SHRT_DESC from CNTRCT_BNFT_RULE_OVRD a,CNTRCT_BNFT_MNING_OVRD b,RULE c,BMST_BNFT_MSTR d, ITEM e where a.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and b.BNFT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_SYS_ID and b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and a.RULE_ID = c.RULE_ID and b.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID and (d.BNFT_CTGRY = e.PRMRY_CD(+) AND e.CTLG_ID(+) = 2222)

SELECT dbms_random.random AS keyval, b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , b.BNFT_CMPNT_NM , b.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD , b.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR , b.BNFT_CMPNT_DESC_TXT , b.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT , b.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT , b.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE , d.RULE_ID , d.RULE_SHRT_DESC , b.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b , PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN c , RULE D, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT e WHERE a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = e.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND c.PROD_SYS_ID = e.PROD_SYS_ID AND c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND d.RULE_ID(+) = c.RULE_ID GROUP BY b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, b.BNFT_CMPNT_NM , b.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD , b.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR , b.BNFT_CMPNT_DESC_TXT , b.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT , b.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT , b.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE , d.RULE_ID , d.RULE_SHRT_DESC , b.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,A.PROD_SYS_ID, A.PROD_NM, A.PROD_FMLY_NM, A.PROD_TYPE, B.PROD_STRCTR_NM, B.PROD_STRCTR_VRSN_NBR,A.PROD_DESC_TXT,A.PROD_EFCTV_DT, A.PROD_EXPIRY_DT,A.PROD_VRSN_NBR,A.PROD_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_MSTR A, PROD_STRCTR_MSTR B, ITEM C WHERE A.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = B.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID(+) AND C.CTLG_ID = 1937 AND A.PROD_FMLY_NM = C.PRMRY_CD AND A.PROD_SYS_ID = {0}

select dbms_random.random as keyval,C.cntrct_sys_id, b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, b.prod_sys_id ,c.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn A,cntrct_dt_sgmnt B, ( select cntrct_sys_id,cntrct_id, cntrct_parnt_sys_id from cmst_cntrct_mstr where (cntrct_id, cntrct_vrsn_nbr) in ( select cntrct_id,max(cntrct_vrsn_nbr) from cmst_cntrct_mstr where cntrct_stts_cd != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION' group by cntrct_id ) ) C,cmst_cntrct_mstr D, cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn E where A.cntrct_sys_id = {0} and d.cntrct_sys_id =A.cntrct_sys_id and c.cntrct_id = d.cntrct_id and E.cntrct_sys_id = C.cntrct_sys_id and B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id =E.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and b.dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt = TO_DATE({1},'mm/dd/yyyy')

select dbms_random.random as keyval,A.ITS_ADJDCTN_IND,A.MEDI_ADJDCTN_IND,A.COB_ADJDCTN_IND,A.DT_SGMNT_BRND_NM, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1947 and PRMRY_CD = A.DT_SGMNT_CRPRT_PLAN_CD) CRPRT_PLAN_CD_DESC, (select b.PRMRY_CD from item b where b.PRMRY_CD in(select c.PROD_FMLY_NM from PROD_MSTR c where c.PROD_SYS_ID=A.PROD_SYS_ID and CTLG_ID =1937))PROD_FMLY_DESC, A.DT_SGMNT_BNFT_PLAN_TXT, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1701 and PRMRY_CD = A.DT_SGMNT_STNDRD_PLAN_CD) STD_PLAN_CD , (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1786 and PRMRY_CD = A.DT_SGMNT_PROD_CD) PROD_CD_DESC, A.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,A.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,A.DT_SGMNT_GRP_SIZE,C.cntrct_id,D.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT, e.cntrct_id,e.cntrct_type from cntrct_dt_sgmnt A , cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn B, cmst_cntrct_mstr C , cntrct_dt_sgmnt D ,cmst_cntrct_mstr E,cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn F where a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} and D.dt_sgmnt_sys_id (+) = A.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id (+) = d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and c.cntrct_sys_id (+) = B.cntrct_sys_id and F.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and E.cntrct_sys_id =F.cntrct_sys_id

select dbms_random.random as keyval,D.CD_DESC_TXT AS TERM, E.CD_DESC_TXT AS QUALIFIER,G.CD_DESC_TXT AS PVA,H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_NAME,C.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID AS REFERENCE, A.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC,I.note_id,I.note_nm from (select DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ,PROD_SYS_ID ,BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ,BNFT_SYS_ID ,BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID ,BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID ,BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID ,BVAL_BNFT_VAL ,BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ,LST_CHG_TMS ,LST_CHG_USR ,CREATD_TM_STMP ,CREATD_USER_ID ,BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ,CNTRCT_BNFT_CSTMZD_TIER_SYS_ID ,CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID from CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD A where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} )A, BLVL_BNFT_LVL B, BLN_BNFT_LINE C , (select PRMRY_CD,CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID =1934) D, (select PRMRY_CD,CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID =1935) E, (select PRMRY_CD,CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID =1936) G, DTYP_DATA_TYPE H, (select A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AS NOTE_BENLINE_ID, A.note_id,A.note_vrsn_nbr, b.note_nm,A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AS BCID, a.prmry_enty_id AS DGID from NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL A , NMST_NOTE_MSTR B where a.PRMRY_ENTY_ID= {0} AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' and A.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND A.note_id =B.note_id and A.note_vrsn_nbr =B.note_vrsn_nbr) I where A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = C.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = C.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID and B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM = D.PRMRY_CD(+) -- Term and B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = E.PRMRY_CD(+) -- Qualifier and C.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = G.PRMRY_CD -- Provider Arrangement AND C.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = I.NOTE_BENLINE_ID(+) AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {3} AND I.BCID(+) = {1} AND I.DGID(+) = {0}
